actions.name: Heatproof
actions.description: Effect: The user takes 50% reduced damage from Fire-Type attacks. If the user has @Affliction[burn], they only take half damage from the @Affliction[burn] damage.

system.description: Effect: The user takes 50% reduced damage from Fire-Type attacks. If the user has @Affliction[burn], they only take half damage from the @Affliction[burn] damage.
